title: If azir was a pokemon...
body:
[](http://www.lolclarity.net/uploads/4/0/2/0/40201127/5091827_orig.jpg)
He would be a Honchcrow
http://pa1.narvii.com/5834/1a99cc3ed0467d3464c2926fa4ec1fb1ab94a3ec_hq.gif
As they are both birds known to lead others.

replies.body: I always thought of him as an Empoleon since they were both royal birds, but Honchkrow works too.
Darn, I didn't even think of empoleon. Least there is a different, perhaps more fitting character for empoleon.

This is the day you almost caught, captain jack swellow.
{{champion:41}}
